headerSubtitle: All in one place you need
apiKeySubtitle: A Google AI API key is required to use the app.
apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Google AI API key
apiKeySetFromEnv: API key is provided by the environment.
promptPlaceholder: e.g., A neon hologram of a cat driving at top speed
jsonPromptNotice: Tip: You can also use a JSON prompt for advanced controls.
customModelIdError: Custom model ID cannot be empty when 'Custom' model type is selected.
apiKeyError: API Key not provided or invalid. Please enter a valid Google AI API key to continue.
emptyGallery: Your gallery is empty. Generate something to see it here!
invalidFileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please upload a PNG, JPEG, or WEBP.

modelDescription.veo_2_0_generate_001: Google's flagship video model, perfect for high-quality, cinematic shots.
modelDescription.veo_3_0_generate_preview: Experimental preview of the next generation VEO model with enhanced capabilities.
modelDescription.custom: Enter a custom VEO model ID for generation.
modelDescription.imagen_3_0_generate_002: A powerful model for generating high-quality images.
modelDescription.imagen_4_0_fast_generate_001: Optimized for speed, ideal for rapid iterations and previews.
modelDescription.imagen_4_0_generate_001: The standard Imagen 4 model, offering a great balance of quality and speed.
modelDescription.imagen_4_0_ultra_generate_001: The most powerful Imagen model for photorealistic and complex scenes.
modelDescription.gemini_2_5_flash_image_preview: A fast and versatile model for iterative image editing and manipulation.
modelDescription.gemini_2_5_flash: The latest and most capable Flash model for balanced performance and speed.
modelDescription.gemini_2_5_pro: The most advanced and capable Gemini model, designed for complex reasoning and creative tasks.

videoModeDescription: Generate high-quality videos from text and images.
imageModeDescription: Create stunning images from detailed text prompts.
imageBuilderModeDescription: Edit an image with a series of prompts.
homeCanvasModeDescription: Seamlessly blend any image into a scene image.
sceneBuildModeDescription: Generate a sequence of videos from an initial image and prompts.
chatModeDescription: Have a multi-turn conversation with Gemini.
systemInstructionPlaceholder: e.g., You are a helpful pirate captain.
defaultSystemInstruction: You are a helpful and creative assistant.
generatingImageMessage: Understood! Generating an image based on your prompt...
resolutionUnsupportedWarning: This feature is currently not supported.
imagePromptPlaceholder: e.g., A majestic lion wearing a crown, studio lighting
imageBuilderFollowUpPromptPlaceholder: e.g., change the shirt color to red
imageBuilderMissingImageError: Could not find a source image to edit. Please start over.
modelDidNotReturnImageError: The model did not return an image. It might not have understood the request.
confirmSwitchMessage: You input will be cleared. Are you sure you want to switch menu?
confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the application? All your current inputs will be permanently deleted.
selectLocationPrompt: Click on the scene to select a placement location

sceneBuild.characterPlaceholder: e.g., a corgi wearing a jetpack

sceneBuildInitialPromptPlaceholder: e.g., a drone shot flying forward through a forest
sceneBuildFollowUpPromptPlaceholder: e.g., the canyon opens up to a vast mountain range

debugInfo.title: Debug Information
debugInfo.noImageUsed: No initial image was used for this step.

fileSystemApiNotSupported: Auto-saving to a local folder is not supported by your browser. Downloads will be manual.

tooltips.saveAndContinue: Save the API key and proceed
tooltips.useEnvKey: Use the API key provided by the environment
tooltips.setDuration: Set the duration of the generated video in seconds
tooltips.setNumVideos: Set the number of videos to generate
tooltips.setResolution: Set the video resolution (only available for landscape)
tooltips.togglePersonGeneration: Allow or disallow the generation of identifiable people
tooltips.changeSaveLocation: Change the folder where files are saved
tooltips.setSaveLocation: Choose a folder to automatically save generated files
tooltips.uploadInitialImage: Click to upload the starting image
tooltips.generateInitialImage: Start the editing session with this image and prompt
tooltips.generateFollowUp: Apply this prompt to the last generated image
tooltips.startNewBuild: Start a new image editing session
tooltips.regenerateStep: Regenerate this step using the same prompt
tooltips.regenerateStepDisabled: Only the latest step can be regenerated
tooltips.startNewSceneBuild: Start a new video scene building session
tooltips.uploadProduct: Click to upload the product/object image
tooltips.uploadScene: Click to upload the background scene image
tooltips.selectPlacement: Click on the image to set the product placement location
tooltips.toggleDebugView: Show/hide the intermediate debug image and prompt
tooltips.useAsScene: Use this generated image as the new scene for further edits
tooltips.startOver: Clear all inputs and start a new session
tooltips.generate: Generate the output based on your inputs
tooltips.viewImage: Click to view this image larger
tooltips.createAnother: Return to the form to create something new
tooltips.addMoreImages: Click to add more images for editing
tooltips.uploadReferenceImage: Click to upload an optional reference image
tooltips.systemInstruction: Guides the model's behavior. For example, 'You are a pirate.'
tooltips.temperature: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.
tooltips.topK: Narrows the model's choices to the K most likely next words.
tooltips.topP: Narrows the model's choices from the most likely words based on their cumulative probability.
tooltips.maxOutputTokens: Set the maximum number of tokens for the response. For some models, a portion is reserved for thinking.
tooltips.googleSearch: Allow the model to use Google Search to find up-to-date information online.
tooltips.responseTime: Time taken for the AI to generate the response
